daily_reporting.name: Daily Reporting Workflow
daily_reporting.description: The standard daily process for an agent to summarize the previous day's events and log them in the `memory/` repositories.

steps.description: Find raw chat logs from the previous day's sessions.
For each chat log, generate a structured summary.
Generate a daily summary markdown from the collected agent summaries.
Save the generated reports to the appropriate date-stamped directories within the `public/` or `private/` repositories.
Archive the processed raw chat logs.

dspy_modules.purpose: Provides a standardized and safe way to make Git commits to any repository. It ensures that git user.name and user.email are correctly set for the agent and that a secret scan is performed before committing. This module is to be used for all commits made by AI agents.

inputs.commit_message: string (The commit message for the git commit.)

outputs.status: string (Either 'Commit successful!' or an error message.)

dspy_modules.purpose: Summarizes a raw chat log from a past agent session, extracting key information such as agent name, last task, status, and performance metrics. The output is used to generate daily and agent-specific reports within the `memory/` system.

inputs.log_file_path: string (The path to the raw chat log file.)

outputs.summary: json (A JSON object containing the extracted summary information.)

dspy_modules.purpose: Generates a comprehensive daily summary in markdown format from a collection of individual AI agent session summaries.

dependencies.description: Requires the JSON output from one or more `dspy_chat_summarizer` runs.

inputs.agent_summaries_file: string (Path to a JSON file containing a list of agent summaries.)

outputs.daily_summary_markdown: string (The generated daily summary in markdown format.)

dspy_modules.purpose: Organizes new screenshots by renaming them with descriptive names, moving them to the appropriate daily `png/` folder, and creating index and `Screenshots.md` files within the `memory/public/` repository.

inputs.source_png_dir: string (The path to the directory containing new screenshots.)

outputs.status: string (A summary of the organization process, including which files were moved and what index files were created.)
